div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1397 Yunak, c. 80 km. NE of Aksehir (anc. Claneus?), Galatian-Phrygian border, 1965 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (M) Contents: 16 AR Alexander III: lifetime and early post. dr. (Abydus 1, Lampsacus 2, Colophon 1, unc. mints 12) Disposition: Ankara (inv. no. 1675) Information from Saadet Taner
